modName: Xenomorph werewolf transformation replacer stand alone updated
summary: Xenomorph werewolf transformation replacer stand alone, as it suggests, it\'s a stand alone transformation.
descriptionHtml:
Xenomorph werewolf transformation replacer stand alone, as it suggests, it\'s a stand alone transformation, it, means, will not affect the other werewolves of the game.You can tranform into a xenomorph and slay everyone in your path, as the creature usually do. You need to be installed
the main mod: Predators the Lost Tribes of Roland, it\'s compatible with dawnguard and dragonborn dlcs. This is not ported!!! and it is a beta mod!! The steam one it\'s ported stuff from the game aliens colonial marines and AVP 2010!!! Heart of the beast mod compatible, moonlight tales is not!
Now skin updated! v.2.0.Mod improved and updated!

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42586/?
author: Ranckel and roland113
